name: libuv

conflicts.name: %gcc platform=darwin
conflicts.description: libuv does not compile with GCC on macOS yet, use clang. See: https://github.com/libuv/libuv/issues/2805

description: Multi-platform library with a focus on asynchronous IO

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools

dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools

dependencies.name: libtool
dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.

dependencies.name: m4
dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.

dependent_to.name: libluv
dependent_to.description:
This library makes libuv available to lua scripts. It was made for the
luvit project but should usable from nearly any lua project.

dependent_to.name: py-horovod
dependent_to.description:
Horovod is a distributed deep learning training framework for
TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, and Apache MXNet.

dependent_to.name: bind9
dependent_to.description: BIND 9 has evolved to be a very flexible, full-featured DNS system.

dependent_to.name: uvw
dependent_to.description:
uvw is a header-only, event based, tiny and easy to use libuv wrapper in
modern C++.

dependent_to.name: neovim

dependent_to.name: cmake

A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.

dependent_to.name: tensorpipe

A tensor-aware point-to-point communication primitive for machine
learning.
